title: [Outside the Aviaries]
description: The high tower rising to the north and the rounded glaes dome of the aviaries to the south create a deep canyon that remains shadowy and cool throughout the day.  From this vantage the strange dichotomy of the dry, desert-like aviary existing next to the thickly grown jungle environment within the dome is readily apparent.

The high tower rising to the north and the rounded glaes dome of the aviaries to the south create a deep canyon that is shrouded in shadows.  From this vantage the strange dichotomy of the dry, desert-like aviary existing next to the thickly grown jungle environment within the dome can barely be made out in the dim moonlight.
